definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
sweep the snow from your own door step, don't worry about the frost on your neighbor's roof (idiom)
pinyin: ge4 ren2 zi4 sao3 men2 qian2 xue3 , mo4 guan3 ta1 jia1 wa3 shang4 shuang1
containing_words.word: 各人自扫门前雪，莫管他家瓦上霜

sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店员警告我说开门前最好先敲敲门，以便把它们吓跑。

sentences.english: The clip-clop of horses' hooves came closer and stopped right in front of the inn.
sentences.chinese: 嘀嘀哒哒的马蹄声越来越近就停在小店门前。

sentences.english: I walked to the locked door, the sounds of the crying becoming louder.
sentences.chinese: 我走到锁着的那扇门前，哭声变得更清楚了。

sentences.english: In the mid-day the gong sounds at the palace gate.
sentences.chinese: 中午，锣声在庙殿门前敲起。

sentences.english: Now, one family is sitting in front of the door to enjoy the cool, chat, full moon, eat moon cakes.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，一家人正坐在门前乘凉，聊天，望月，吃月饼。

sentences.english: The gate piles in front of his house are carved lions.
sentences.chinese: 他家门前的门墩被雕刻成一对狮子。

sentences.english: Washed by rain, the wheat field and grape trellises in front of the door beautifully shimmered with brilliant yellow and tender green.
sentences.chinese: 门前的麦垅和葡萄架子，都濯得新黄嫩绿的非常鲜丽。

sentences.english: After the bell rang, a succession of little visitors came to our door, vying to see Holly.
sentences.chinese: 铃响后，一伙小参观者陆续来到门前，争着要看霍莉。

sentences.english: In folds of golden fulness within my door?
sentences.chinese: 你甘让你那音乐飘落在我门前。

sentences.english: He paced up and down in front of his boss's door, still not brave enough to resign.
sentences.chinese: 他在老板门前来回蹀躞，还是没有勇气提出辞职。

sentences.english: So Naaman went with his horses and chariots and stopped at the door of Elisha's house.
sentences.chinese: 于是，乃缦带着车马到了以利沙的家，站在门前。

sentences.english: Eventually they reached a pair of ornately carved doors.
sentences.chinese: 他们最终来到一扇雕刻精美的对开门前。

sentences.english: Eventually, they came to Ms Mujawamariya's door.
sentences.chinese: 最后，民兵来到穆加瓦玛瑞亚女士的家门前。

sentences.english: I'm standing in front of Louie's Seaside Restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我站在路易斯海滨饭店门前。

definition: one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
to keep goal/on duty as gatekeeper
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
the back door/fig. under the counter (indirect way for influence or pressure)/anus
